title: A machine learning analysis on survey data from 16 countries
summary: This article presents a machine learning analysis on survey data collected from 16 countries, detailing data availability and ethical approvals.
usefulness_reason: The title directly mentions "survey data", which is one of the key search terms. While it doesn't explicitly mention spatio-temporal point processes, the use of machine learning on survey data could involve contextual datasets and potentially spatio-temporal aspects, making it relevant but not directly focused.
